original_text: Whenever the spirit from God came on Saul, David would take up his lyre and play. Then relief would come to Saul; he would feel better, and the evil spirit would leave him.
korean_text: 하나님께서 부리시는 악령이 사울에게 이를 때에 다윗이 수금을 들고 와서 손으로 탄즉 사울이 상쾌하여 낫고 악령이 그에게서 떠나더라

sentences.original_text: Whenever the spirit from God came on Saul
David would take up his lyre and play
Then relief would come to Saul
and the evil spirit would leave him
